title: Machine Intelligence - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/21/22
itunes:title: Machine Intelligence - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 2/21/22
description:
George Noory and author Luke Lafitte discuss advancements in artificial intelligence, if mankind has lost control of the technology too quickly, and if machines will one day develop their own consciousness and be able to make decisions for themselves.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
